ri2
  • Reference

Conduct Randomization Inference

Conduct Randomization Inference

conduct_ri(formula, alpha = 0.05, assignment = "Z", declaration, data,
  IPW = TRUE, sharp_hypothesis = 0, sims = 1000)

Arguments

formula

an object of class formula, as in lm.
alpha

The significance level, 0.05 by default.
assignment

a character string that indicates which variable is randomly assigned. Defaults to "Z".
declaration

A random assignment declaration, created by declare_ra.
data

A data.frame.

Contents

  • Arguments
